name: grp13-container-export
label: GRP-13: Anonymized/De-identified File Export
description: Template-based anonymization and export of files within a project. Files within the source project will be anonymized (according to a required template) and exported to a specified project. Output is a csv file reporting the status of all exported items.
author: Flywheel SSE

deid_template.description: A Flywheel de-identification template specifying the de-identification actions to perform.

subject_csv.description: A CSV file that contains mapping values to apply for subjects during de-identification.

project_path.description: The resolver path of the destination project (E.g., 'flywheel/test').

file_type.description: The type of files to de-identify/anonymize and export.

overwrite_files.description: If true, existing files in destination containers will be overwritten if a file to be exported has the same filename.
